entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 12:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
